summary: Diagnosed with cystic fibrosis from a young age, performance artist Bob Flanagan shared his life and pain in his art, usually through sadomasochistic practices.
cast: Kathe Burkhart|Kirby Dick|Bob Flanagan|Sheree Rose|Rita Valencia|Sarah Doucette|Richard Kopelle
title: Sick: The Life & Death of Bob Flanagan, Supermasochist
